EditTextPreference.android:title: Admin Password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Enter the admin password to unlock these settings.

EditTextPreference.android:title: API Key
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Enter the API key for communicating with the backend server.

SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow entry of BIB number that does not exist in the database (Useful to be ON, you suspect that some runners are not entered in the database)
SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow non-registered BIBs

EditTextPreference.android:title: BIB number digits
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Number of digits for the BIB numbers (default and recommended: 3)

EditTextPreference.android:title: Lock runner time
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Time (in minutes) after a successful entry of a runner, in which another entry of the same runner is not allowed. 0 = no lock

EditTextPreference.android:title: Entry Reset Time
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Duration (in milliseconds) after which the entered digits are reset. This is set to avoid unintentional entries.

EditTextPreference.android:title: [Visual] Entry Flashing Time
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Duration (in milliseconds) of a keyboard flashing during an entry. Visual tweak.
